title: Victoria bushfires rage as manhunt continues | 7NEWS
description: Multiple out-of-control bushfires continue to burn across Victoria after the state recorded its all-time highest temperature of 48 degrees, with thousands of residents evacuated and firefighting crews battling blazes across several communities. New South Wales police continue their sixth day searching for alleged triple murderer Julian Ingram following fatal shootings at Lake Cajelico, with officers scouring properties around Mount Hope. David Littleproud delays announcing his front bench amid speculation of a potential coalition reunion between the Nationals and Liberals as One Nation surges in polling. description: Multiple out-of-control bushfires are burning across Victoria following the state's all-time highest recorded temperature of 48 degrees Celsius. Tens of thousands of residents are experiencing power outages across the affected areas. title: Trump reshuffles immigration crackdown leadership after Minneapolis shooting | 7NEWS
description: President Trump is making leadership changes to the immigration crackdown in Minneapolis following public backlash over the shooting death of Alex Preti. Border czar Tom Homan will replace Greg Bovino as commander of operations, while Trump has softened his rhetoric towards Democratic leaders including Governor Tim Walz. Despite the changes in tone and leadership, the president maintains his resolve to continue deportations of illegal immigrants in Minneapolis. title: Landslides and polar vortex cause chaos | 7NEWS
description: Multiple natural disasters and extreme weather events are affecting Europe and North America. A landslide on Sicily has forced over 1,000 residents to evacuate after heavy rainfall and a cyclone, prompting Italy to declare a national state of emergency across three regions. A polar vortex is gripping North America with temperatures well below freezing, causing 28 deaths and cancelling over 19,000 flights across the United States. title: Landslide leaves Sicilian homes on cliff edge
description: More than 1,500 people have been evacuated from the Sicilian town of Niscemi after violent storms caused a major landslide which left homes teetering on the edge of a cliff. #landslide #storm #sicily #italy #europe

title: Spain to pay $35 million in compensation to train crash victims' families
description: The families of the 45 victims of last week's high speed train crash in Spain will receive $AU370,000 as compensation for their loss. #spain #traincrash #madrid #compensation #europe

title: ICE to have security role at Winter Olympics
description: ICE agents will have a role in supporting US security operations at next month's Winter Olympic Games in Italy. #ice #security #olympics #winterolympics #italy

title: Trump changes stance after Minnesota shooting backlash grows
description: Donald Trump has shifted his stance towards the shooting death of 37-year-old ICU nurse Alex Pretti after growing backlash, calling for an investigation to be conducted.   The US President also called for the removal of Greg Bovino, the US Border Patrol commander, from Minnesota, replacing him with his border czar Tom Homan. #trump #minnesota #minneapolis #ice #usa

title: Colin Boyce to challenge David Littleproud for Nationals leadership
description: Queensland MP Colin Boyce has announced he'll challenge David Littleproud for the National Party leadership. #colinboyce #davidlittleproud #nationals #nationalparty #auspol

title: New inflation figures push Australia towards interest rate hike
description: Inflation has increased according to new figures, pushing Australia towards an interest rate hike when the Reserve Bank meets next month. #inflation #economy #money #finance #interestrates
